bibl.title: A Forthcoming Catalogue of Nome Strategi.
bibl.note: It is intended to print a list of nome strategi and keep the type permanently set up, so that whenever sufficient additions and corrections have accumulated, a new edition can be brought out.
bibl.seg: Skeat T.C., A Forthcoming Catalogue of Nome Strategi.
It is intended to print a list of nome strategi and keep the type permanently set up, so that whenever sufficient additions and corrections have accumulated, a new edition can be brought out.
